Flash Mode is a recurring awakening mode used by [[Minato Namikaze]] throughout the ''Naruto Ultimate Ninja'' and ''Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes'' series. It greatly increases Minato's dash, attack and jump speed in all of its depictions.

The flash mode moveset is not reliant on the use of Minato's trademark [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]], which may imply it is based on his mastery over the [[Body Flicker Technique]] instead, which both his enemies and students confused with the [[Flying Thunder God Technique]].
